title: *Now resolved* Google Chrome will not update to the latest version on Pixel 4...how do I fix this?
content:
*Now resolved - Problem seems to have fixed itself and the app updated overnight.*

Having an issue where Google Chrome will not update on my Pixel 4 XL.

It downloads, goes to the installing stage and sits there.

I've tried a number of times in the last 24 hours, even disabled chrome and rebooted the device etc but nothing.

Anyone else having this issue and resolved it?

Cheers
